subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: A postrace video interview with Friday’s World Cup downhill winner, Bode Miller, resonated with a young Swiss racer named Sandro Viletta, who won Saturday’s super-G race.
snippet: A postrace video interview with Friday’s World Cup downhill winner, Bode Miller, resonated with a young Swiss racer named Sandro Viletta, who won Saturday’s super-G race.
